title: Under Armour Men's Packaged Base 4.0 Leggings
description: UA Base 4.0 Extreme Baselayer is our warmest yet, delivering extreme warmth in the extreme cold|UA Scent Control Technology to keep you undetected in all pursuits|Soft, brushed grid interior traps air, managing your body's microclimate to keep you warm & comfortable|Material wicks sweat & dries really fast|4-way stretch construction moves better in every direction|Performance elastic waistband

UA Base 4.0 Extreme Baselayer is our warmest yet, locking in your body's heat to deliver extreme warmth in the extreme cold. UA Scent Control Technology to keep you undetected in all pursuits. Soft, brushed grid interior traps air against your skin, closely managing your body's microclimate to keep you warm & comfortable. Material wicks sweat & dries really fast. 4-way stretch construction moves better in every direction. Performance elastic waistband. Working fly. Inseam: 30.5". Under Armour Men's ColdGear Base 4.0 Leggings are built for the snow, extreme cold weather and lower activity. These men's cold weather leggings feature a unique pattern traps heat without adding bulk. Think long underwear, revamped for today's top athletes. Wear under, or as, your gym pants, training pants or workout pants. Under Armour inspires you with high-performance, quality athletic gear you never knew you needed and can’t imagine living without. From stretchy, sweat wicking fabric to keep you light in the heat to cold weather gear that keeps you warm, Under Armour clothing helps you perform at your best. Ideal for the gym, sports or outdoor fitness—from football, basketball, golf, volleyball and tennis to hiking, running, cycling, yoga and weight training. Whatever training you do, get inspired with Under Armour.
